Title: Dragon Ball Z: Bardock - The Father of Goku
Writer: Akira Toriyama (manga "Dragon Ball"), Takao Koyama (scenario), Katsuyuki Sumizawa (scenario), Neil Bligh (Writer: English Version)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Kazuyuki Sogabe, Yûko Mita, Takeshi Watabe
Plot: A prequel to the original Dragonball series, this TV movie tells the story of Son Goku's father Bardock and his futile attempt to stop Freeza from destroying his planet Vegeta. It also shows how little Kakarotto (Son Goku) ends up on earth!
